title: Account
lowSecurityDescription: Your account security level is low. Please set up the following as soon as possible.
emailAuthDescription: For login, withdraw, password retrieval, security settings change.
phoneAuthDescription: For login, password retrieval, security settings change.
authenticationAppDescription: Use authentication codes when managing assets and other functions
passwordError: The two passwords do not match
newPhoneError: Please enter a right phone number
google2FAPlaceholder: Please enter the Google Authenticator code
deleteAccountBullet1: Your personal information and related data (e.g. history, favorites, orders) will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
deleteAccountBullet2: You will not be able to use the services related to this account.
deleteAccountBullet3: Before deletion, please make sure you have backed up the data you need.
deleteAccountAgreement: I have read and understand that all data will not be recoverable after deletion
